ygData.msgSnippet: The wrecked earth where the stasis pod crashed, it now harbors the life of the planet. Some raccons have nested around the pod. From the air a blast of energy

To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com
Subject: Protoform
From: Robert Dahl <rdahl@...>

The wrecked earth where the stasis pod crashed, it now harbors the life of
the planet. Some raccons have nested around the pod. From the air a blast
of energy erups, blasting around them, causing them to scatter. Then
thrusters can be heard. Astroblast careens down to the site of the pod. The
two Stunticons jump out of the door and glide to the ground, and
Astroblast, free of cargo, transforms to robot mode following them. They
all land. "Filthy organic creature" spouts Astroblast. "He he, hey
Astroblast the pods still intact, its in good shape" Wildrider shouts.
"Then open it dummy" insults Dead-End. Wilrider pushes the button, and the
lid folds open. "Awwwwww" Wildrider moans, "The proto forms slag, to much
energon build up". "It dosent matter" says Astroblast, rubing the pods
hull. "Like you said the pods in good shape. We can use it". With that,
Dead-End pulls out his psi air blaster, and starts to cut it apart with air
pressure.
